item.title: MIUI OS2.0.114.0.VOLCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi Turbo 4 Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Turbo 4 Pro China

Codename: onyx

Version: OS2.0.114.0.VOLCNXM | 15.0

Size: 487 Bytes

MD5: a71f1bc559f8606f4feec6c11f0648b6

Changelog:
[Basic improvements]
Optimization: Gaming experience
[System]
Optimization: Battery usage issues for some games
Optimization: Battery usage issues for some scenarios
Optimization: Custom color demos for back light effects
Optimization: Interface for wired reverse charging
Updated the security patch to April 2025. Increased system security.
[Camera]
New: Dynamic shots can now be played with watermarks

Download: Here
